author: Ronald Barusch
title: Dealpolitik: CBS Directors Play a Subtle Game in Viacom Battle
text:
It’s not every day that a company picks a fight with a shareholder that has 80% control and the right to replace the entire board at any time. And it is even more remarkable that went to war with National Amusements Inc. in a courtroom, where on Thursday CBS lost the first battle. Still, on […]
